name: Crab Rangoon II
author: cabs616
summary: These Chinese crab rangoons are better than the takeout kind! Bok choy is a Chinese cabbage that can be found in most grocery stores.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package small won ton wrappers
directions: Heat oil for frying in deep-fryer or large, heavy saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large skillet
Add garlic and onion, and saute for 2 minutes
Add bok choy and pea pods, and stir fry until the bok choy and pea pods are crisp-tender
In a large mixing bowl, combine crab, cream cheese, soy sauce and sauteed vegetable mixture
Drop mixture by 3/4 teaspoon into the center of a won ton wrapper
Fold the wrapper in half to make a triangle
Seal the wrapper around the mixture by wetting your finger with cold water and pressing the ends together
In batches, fry the dumplings in the prepared oil until golden brown
